en.about.heading: Process Engineer & Sustainability Specialist
en.about.text1: I am a highly skilled process engineer with dual master's degrees in Sustainable Energy and Energy & Environmental Technology. My expertise spans across HVAC systems, heat pump technology, and sustainable energy solutions.
en.about.text2: With professional experience in technical consulting, energy optimization, and market research, I combine technical expertise with strategic insights to drive sustainable innovation in the energy sector.

en.education.1.degree: Master of Science in Sustainable Energy
en.education.1.desc1: Specialized in Heat Pumping Processes and Systems. Coursework included Gas Technology, Gas Cleaning and Emission Control, Energy Management in Buildings, System Simulation, Heat and Mass Transfer, Heat Pumping and Processes and Systems, Heat Pumps for Heating and Cooling in Buildings, Sustainable Energy Systems, European Cryogenics Courses, and Python Programming.
en.education.1.desc2: Master Thesis: Development of Fossil Free Heating System and Thermal Storage Based on Heat Pump in Poultry Farm.

en.education.2.desc1: Coursework included Modeling of Dynamic Systems, Scientific Computing, Thermodynamics, Transport Processes, Water Treatment and Environmental Biotechnology, Gas Purification and Energy Optimization, Combustion and Process Safety, Energy Technology, Project Management and Cost Engineering, Ignition Energy of Gases, and Process Control.
en.education.2.desc2: Master's Thesis: Study of Ash Melting Behavior in the Biomass Gasification Reactor.
en.education.3.desc1: Acquired a comprehensive foundation in core engineering disciplines, from Mechanics of Solids and Fluid Mechanics to Thermodynamics and Heat Transfer. Practical applications emphasized through extensive laboratory work, including Material Science and Thermal Engineering labs.
en.education.3.desc2: Developed firm grasp of design principles through Computer-Aided Design and Machine Design courses, with deepened understanding of energy systems via subjects like Renewable Energy Resources and Power Plant Engineering.

education.1.course7: Varmepumper for oppvarming og kjøling i bygninger
education.1.thesis: Utvikling av fossilfritt varmesystem og termisk lagring basert på varmepumpe i fjørfegård
education.1.modalDesc: Dette omfattende programmet ga meg avansert kunnskap om bærekraftige energisystemer med fokus på varmepumpeteknologi. Gjennom omfattende kursarbeid og praktiske prosjekter utviklet jeg ekspertise i å designe energieffektive oppvarmings- og kjølesystemer med hensyn til miljøpåvirkning. Masteroppgaven ga meg mulighet til å anvende teoretisk kunnskap på et praktisk problem, ved å designe et fossilfritt varmesystem for landbruksapplikasjoner.
